definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: drip, drop (cf. Ar. 9arafa lade out water with the hand (as with ladle), cf. Ph. [[ערפת]] portico (whence rain drips) v. Hoffm:Abh. d. GGW xxxvi, May, 1889, 12 f.; cf. also Ar. gurfah;un upper-room; [[מערף ענן]] Sir 43:22 the dropping of a cloud, As. irpu, irpitu, cloud(s));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[שָׁמָיו יַעַרְפוּ־טָָל]] De 33:28 his heavens drop dew; fig., of speech, intrans., [[יַעֲרׂף כַּמָּטָר]] [[לִקְחִי]] De 32:2 let my teaching drop like the rain (‖[[תִּזַּל כַּטַּל אִמְרָתִי]]).—Cf. [[רָעַף]].
